description:
"When the red moon rises, the apocalypse shall visit the world..."
After many monster battles, Ren and his friends finally set all of the energy points free. But immediately afterward, Nostradamus gave a prophecy warning of a bleak future, enveloping all who heard it in indescribable anxiety. As the gang mulls over the prophecy, Mana is still struggling to understand Miroku`s declaration that she holds "the power to change the world." After watching her for some time, Walpurgis tells Mana a truth she had been hiding from her. Meanwhile, Madarame is preparing to announce a new project to the world. What are his plans? And what did Walpurgis tell Mana? Are Ren and his friends headed for the dark future in the prophecy? The story finally reaches its exciting climax!
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
- The struggle for existence begins! -
With all of the Energy Points unleashed, Nostradamus foretells of a bleak future,
leaving Ren feeling uneasy. Amidst this new development,
President Madarame announces his newest project to the world.
And just when it seems like things couldn`t get any worse,
Ren and Ryoma`s greatest foe appears: Eden.
Meanwhile, long after watching in silence, Miroku begins to make her move...
Source: Youtube

- It must be done. Destruction for salvation. -
Miroku`s true intentions are finally clear.
She says if the monster world and the human world continue to merge, the cosmos will near its end.
To save it, Miroku plans to destroy the human world. Naturally, Ren and company are strongly opposed to this,
but to stop her, it seems they have no choice but to fight...
Source: Youtube

titles.title: An Overwhelming Gap in Strength! Miroku Stands in the Way
Attouteki na Chikara no Sa! Tachifusagaru Miroku
圧倒的な力の差! 立ちふさがるミロク

REGULAR.description:
Ren, Aoi, Minami, and Akira... Thank you for giving me strength.
Ren and company crumble hopelessly before the overwhelming power of Miroku.
As her friends lay in the hospital, Mana stands there, acting the same as always. But then she begins to think about what Miroku said, and conflict grows inside her. As troubling thoughts fill her head, she goes to see Walpurgis. Witnessing her injuries first-hand, Mana finally decides to...
Source: Youtube

titles.title: 明かされるマナの真実

REGULAR.description:
- When we choose one thing, we throw something else away... -
Leaving behind nothing more than a note, Mana suddenly disappears.
Ren and the crew try to piece together where she could have gone,
eventually going to speak to the heavily-injured Walpurgis.
When Walpurgis tells them Mana`s secret and her plan to sacrifice herself,
Ren and crew rush to save her.
Source: Youtube

titles.title: Mana o Sukue! Sorezore no Ketsui
Save Mana! The Decisions They Each Make
マナを救え! それぞれの決意

REGULAR.description:
- Creatures of the living, your souls will be mine... -
Walpurgis reveals Mana`s secret to Ren and company as Miroku continues her preparations at Madarame Tower.
When Ren and crew head there to save Mana, Miroku summons forth the otherwordly Yomi to stop them dead in their tracks!
Source: Youtube

titles.title: Shi no Kuni no Shikaku, Yomi
死の國の刺客, 黄泉

REGULAR.description:
- Behold the realm of Yomi... -
As Ren and company press onward to save Mana,
Akira and his group face a fierce battle against Yomi`s Army of Doom.
Just as things are looking bleak, out come Haruma and Lucy! Meanwhile,
when Ren`s group reaches the rooftop,
they see something completely unexpected...
[i]
Source: Youtube[/i]

- I am the bringer of the red moon... -
Mana awakens as the bringer of the red moon.
Upon transforming into a monster, she is attacked by an onslaught of missiles, but then she responds with her own overwhelming power.
As the situation unfolds before them, Ren and company watch in horror.
They desperately call out to Mana, hoping they can somehow bring her back to her senses...
Source: Youtube

- I`ll go. I`ll save Mana. And Ryoma`s coming with me! -
When it seems even Walpurgis`s magic can`t stop the monstrous Mana,
Ren and company discover that Mana`s real body is hidden inside Miroku`s altar.
Heeding Walpurgis`s words, Ren and Ryoma rush onward to save Mana!
Source: Youtube

titles.title: Only Thou Can Know What Thou Must Do
Waga Nasu Koto wa Waga Nomizu Shiru
我が成すことは我のみぞ知る

REGULAR.description:
- This is the path I choose... To stand with Ren! -
Ren and Ryoma venture inside the red moon`s altar.
Through the strength of their friendship,
they defeat the spectral defenses and enter the altar`s inner reaches,
where they find Mana bound helplessly.
To save her, it seems they`ll have to go up against Miroku herself!

titles.title: 死闘 龍馬とミロク

REGULAR.description:
-I`d stake my life to protect my friend! -
Ryoma puts his life on the line in a battle against Miroku.
Meanwhile, Ren tries to reach Mana but suffers serious injuries from the altar`s defenses.
It seems the time for Mana`s awakening is soon at hand...
Source: Youtube

titles.title: 龍馬, 命を燃やして

REGULAR.description:
- Flames of purity, be my strength! -
Ren and his Strike Ring awaken new powers within Mana.
Miroku is unfazed by this new turn of events, but can Mana summon forth the power to stop the red moon?
Source: Youtube

- I couldn`t have made it this far without you... -
Mana fights to protect everyone she holds dear. 
Miroku fights to protect humanity from its cycle of suffering. 
With the ominous red moon drawing ever closer, 
it seems their struggle will soon come to an end.
Source: Youtube

- And now, a new day dawns... -
Three years have passed since the unprecedented catastrophe. 
Though the world still holds its share of scars, 
it continues to recover from the battle that once was. 
And now, the young souls that were caught up in 
it all go back to life as they know it...

titles.title: Monster Strike Anime: Kieyuku Uchuu Hen
モンストアニメ 消えゆく宇宙編
怪物弹珠 第二季 消逝的宇宙篇
